resources.string:
Your mission, should you choose to accept it, 
is to reach Cory Hall and disarm the bomb 
within 15 minutes
Follow the map below to find AGENT012. Use your secret message to make sure that you find the correct person. At last, ask the contact to enter the secret code to complete the mission.
Longest distance walked: 0 miles \nFastest completion time: 20 seconds
